location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Extract Telegram from Foreign Secretary, Calcutta to Sir Lewis Pelly, Baroda

mods.abstract: Extract of the Telegram instructing Pelly to arrest the Gaekwar and inform him of the charges being made against him. The telegram goes on to give instructions on the conditions and arrangements that should be made for his confinement and to ensure he can properly prepare his case.
